    1. initialize(E)

Interface Initializer<E extends EstimationFunction>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of estimation function being initialized
All Known Subinterfaces:
NeuralNetworkInitializer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdalineInitializer, ConstantInitializer, HeInitializer, PerceptronInitializer, RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer, XavierInitializer
@DomainObject @Strategy(INTERFACE) public interface Initializer<E extends EstimationFunction>
Defines an initialization strategy for an EstimationFunction.

An Initializer is responsible for preparing an estimation function (e.g., a machine learning model) before training begins. This may involve setting parameter values, allocating resources, or performing other setup tasks required to ensure that the model starts from a valid and meaningful state.

Different implementations can provide different initialization strategies, such as random initialization, Xavier/Glorot initialization, or restoring from a saved checkpoint.

See Also:
  • EstimationFunction

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initialize(E estimationFunction)
    Initializes the given estimation function according to the initialization strategy defined by the implementation.
